org.jruyi.common

Interface ServiceHolderManager.IFactory

  • Enclosing class:
    ServiceHolderManager

    public static interface ServiceHolderManager.IFactory
    A factory to create IServiceHolderManager objects. It is used to separate the implementation provider from the API module.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> IServiceHolderManager<T> create(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context, java.lang.Class<T> clazz, java.lang.String nameOfId)
      Creates a new IServiceHolderManager object.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        <T> IServiceHolderManager<T> create(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context,
                                    java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                    java.lang.String nameOfId)
        Creates a new IServiceHolderManager object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the service to be hold
        Parameters:
        context - a bundle context bound to the service holder manager for getting services.
        clazz - the class of services to be managed
        nameOfId - the name of the service property used as the service ID
        Returns:
        a service holder manager
